Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to permitting  A Beautiful Noise, LLC  to file an application for a New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit for 2022
Summary: Permits "A Beautiful Noise, LLC" to file an application for a New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit for 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to permitting "A Beautiful Noise, LLC" to file an application for a New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit
